name: Dragon's Hope (Demo)
description:
Dragon's Hope is a story-driven puzzle game.  It starts off with the mother of a young dragon getting badly injured when a human tries to slay her. The young dragon tries to help his mother but with no success. Before she falls asleep, she tells the dragon to travel to the top of the mountain and to speak to the wolf that lives there. The wolf seems to know how to help the dragon's mother, but first the dragon has to prove that he's worth his help and walks off into his cave where the player has to find him. Finding the wolf in his ice-themed cave represents chapter 1 of the game which can be played in this demo.

Demo Info

Dragon's Hope is currently in developement. This download features chapter 1 of the game. The playtime of chapter 1 should be at least 2 hours or longer, depending on how good you are at solving  puzzles. The game will have 6 chapters in total.  Any donations will go directly towards custom art for the game, specifically character faces. Features of this Demo:

  • Introduction to the story
  • Big ice/crystal themed puzzle dungeon
  • Including 7 different types of puzzles, some with varying difficulty
  • 3 big maps representing the mountain, Damian's home
  • Abilities tied to consumable items which can be collected throughout the world
